text.div: Implementation Guide for IHE PDQm profile. The Patient Demographics Query or Mobile (PDQm) Profile defines a lightweight RESTful interface to a patient demographics supplier leveraging technologies readily available to mobile applications and lightweight browser based applications. The IHE PDQm Profile text is Normative, this conformance resource is Informative.
